name: Super Illusion of the Century
text:
You can only use this Skill's second effect once per turn.
1: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Performage Trapeze Magician" to your Extra Deck.
2: During the Main Phase of a turn that you took effect damage, shuffle 1 Spellcaster monster from your Graveyard or your banished cards into the Deck.
